posts.title: win10去除快捷方式小箭头
posts.text: 1.去掉小箭头123456reg add "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Shell Icons" /v 29 /d "%systemroot%\system32\imageres.dll,197" /t reg_sz /ftaskkill /f /im explorer.exeattrib -s -r -h "%userprofile%\AppData\Local\iconcache.db"del "%userprofile%\AppData\Local\iconcache.db" /f /qstart explorerpause 2.恢复小箭头123456reg delete "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Shell Icons" /v 29 /ftaskkill /f /im explorer.exeattrib -s -r -h "%userprofile%\AppData\Local\iconcache.db"del "%userprofile%\AppData\Local\iconcache.db" /f /qstart explorerpause 复制以上代码保存至.bat文件，管理员身份打开即可

posts.title: nginx配置正向代理
posts.text: centos7安装nginx下载nginx1wget http://nginx.org/download/nginx-x.x.x.tar.gz 解压1tar -xzvf nginx-x.x.x.tar.gz 安装编译环境123cd nginx-x.x.xyum updateyum -y install gcc pcre pcre-devel zlib zlib-devel openssl openssl-devel 编译1make & make install 验证1/usr/local/nginx/sbin/nginx -V 输出如下：12345nginx version: nginx/1.14.0built by gcc 4.8.5 20150623 (Red Hat 4.8.5-28) (GCC) built with OpenSSL 1.0.2k-fips 26 Jan 2017TLS SNI support enabledconfigure arguments: --user=www --group=www --prefix=/usr/local/nginx --with-http_ssl_module --with-http_stub_status_module --with-threads 创建软链接1ln -s /usr/local/nginx/sbin/nginx /usr/bin/nginx 开机自启1vim /etc/init.d/nginx 输入如下内容123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112#!/bin/sh## nginx - this script starts and stops the nginx daemon## chkconfig: - 85 15# description: NGINX is an HTTP(S) server, HTTP(S) reverse \# proxy and IMAP/POP3 proxy server# processname: nginx# config: /usr/local/nginx/conf/nginx.conf# config: /etc/sysconfig/nginx# pidfile: /usr/local/nginx/logs/nginx.pid# Source function library.. /etc/rc.d/init.d/functions# Source networking configuration.. /etc/sysconfig/network# Check that networking is up.[ "$NETWORKING" = "no" ] && exit 0nginx="/usr/local/nginx/sbin/nginx"prog=$(basename $nginx)NGINX_CONF_FILE="/usr/local/nginx/conf/nginx.conf"[ -f /etc/sysconfig/nginx ] && . /etc/sysconfig/nginxlockfile=/var/lock/subsys/nginxmake_dirs() { # make required directories user=`$nginx -V 2>&1 | grep "configure arguments:" | sed 's/[^*]*--user=\([^ ]*\).*/\1/g' -` if [ -z "`grep $user /etc/passwd`" ]; then useradd -M -s /bin/nologin $user fi options=`$nginx -V 2>&1 | grep 'configure arguments:'` for opt in $options; do if [ `echo $opt | grep '.*-temp-path'` ]; then value=`echo $opt | cut -d "=" -f 2` if [ ! -d "$value" ]; then # echo "creating" $value mkdir -p $value && chown -R $user $value fi fi done}start() { [ -x $nginx ] || exit 5 [ -f $NGINX_CONF_FILE ] || exit 6 make_dirs echo -n $"Starting $prog: " daemon $nginx -c $NGINX_CONF_FILE retval=$? echo [ $retval -eq 0 ] && touch $lockfile return $retval}stop() { echo -n $"Stopping $prog: " killproc $prog -QUIT retval=$? echo [ $retval -eq 0 ] && rm -f $lockfile return $retval}restart() { configtest || return $? stop sleep 1 start}reload() { configtest || return $? echo -n $"Reloading $prog: " killproc $nginx -HUP RETVAL=$? echo}force_reload() { restart}configtest() { $nginx -t -c $NGINX_CONF_FILE}rh_status() { status $prog}rh_status_q() { rh_status >/dev/null 2>&1}case "$1" in start) rh_status_q && exit 0 $1 ;; stop) rh_status_q || exit 0 $1 ;; restart|configtest) $1 ;; reload) rh_status_q || exit 7 $1 ;; force-reload) force_reload ;; status) rh_status ;; condrestart|try-restart) rh_status_q || exit 0 ;; *) echo $"Usage: $0 {start|stop|status|restart|condrestart|try-restart|reload|force-reload|configtest}" exit 2esac 赋予脚本可执行权限1chmod a+x /etc/init.d/nginx 将nginx服务加入chkconfig管理列表12chkconfig --add /etc/init.d/nginxchkconfig nginx on 启动1systemctl start nginx 测试1curl localhost:80 会有如下输出12345678910111213141516171819202122232425<!DOCTYPE html><html><head><title>Welcome to nginx!</title><style> body { width: 35em; margin: 0 auto; font-family: Tahoma, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; }</style></head><body><h1>Welcome to nginx!</h1><p>If you see this page, the nginx web server is successfully installed andworking. Further configuration is required.</p><p>For online documentation and support please refer to<a href="http://nginx.org/">nginx.org</a>.<br/>Commercial support is available at<a href="http://nginx.com/">nginx.com</a>.</p><p><em>Thank you for using nginx.</em></p></body></html> 配置优化下列配置在nginx.conf里与http节点同级 123456789101112cd /usr/local/nginx/confvim nginx.confuser www www;worker_processes auto;worker_rlimit_nofile 51200;events { use epoll; worker_connections 51200; multi_accept on; } http节点下加入下列配置，将会从指定目录加载配置文件 1include /etc/nginx/*.conf; 对于安装模块开启https正向代理###模块的github仓库https://github.com/chobits/ngx_http_proxy_connect_module###查询对应nginx版本 1patch -p1 < /path/to/ngx_http_proxy_connect_module/patch/proxy_connect.patch [注]这里proxy_connect.patch对应nginx版本 1234567./configure \--prefix=/usr/local/nginx \--with-http_ssl_module \--with-http_stub_status_module \--with-http_realip_module \--with-threads \--add-module=/path/to/ngx_http_proxy_connect_module 常用命令1234567891011# 启动systemctl start nginx# 查看状态systemctl status nginx# 停止systemctl stop nginx# 重载配置nginx -s reload# 测试配置是否正确nginx -t

posts.title: github配置webhook实现博客自动部署
posts.slug: github配置webhook实现博客自动部署
posts.text: 因为经常更新博客，每次都需要手动push，再从github上pull到主机，重复操作很麻烦，因此配置webhook实现自动部署，解放双手！ ###在主机中写入server.js文件 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738var http = require('http') , exec = require('exec') const PORT = 9988 , PATH = '../html' var deployServer = http.createServer(function(request, response) { if (request.url.search(/deploy\/?$/i) > 0) { var commands = [ 'cd ' + PATH, 'git fetch --all', 'git reset --hard origin/master', 'git pull origin master' ].join(' && ') exec(commands, function(err, out, code) { if (err instanceof Error) { response.writeHead(500) response.end('Server Internal Error.') throw err } process.stderr.write(err) process.stdout.write(out) response.writeHead(200) response.end('Deploy Done.') }) } else { response.writeHead(404) response.end('Not Found.') }}) deployServer.listen(PORT) ###后台启动server.js因为直接使用node server.js ，可能会被杀掉进程，不能保持运行，所以使用pm2来管理进程，(或者使用forever) 1npm install pm2 -g 另外使用server_run.js脚本来启动server.js 1234567891011//runconst { exec } = require('child_process')exec('node server.js',(error, stdout, stderr) => { if(error){ console.log('exec error: ${error}') return } console.log('stdout: ${stdout}'); console.log('stderr: ${stderr}');}) 将server_run.js添加到pm2进程 123456789sudo pm2 start server_run.js // 启动服务 sudo pm2 save // 保存服务 sudo pm2 startup // 把已启动服务加到systemd中 sudo systemctl reboot // 重启，发现之前的服务都已经启动 sudo pm2 unstartup systemd // 删除自动启动服务 ###使用forever保持进程安装forever 1npm install -g forever 运行 1forever start server.js 好了，server.js监听9988端口，https://github.com/[ 用户名 ]/[ 仓库名称 ]/settings/hooks中添加http://198.168.xxx.xxx:9988/deploy/当本地Push仓库后，github会自动发送请求从而实现自动部署

posts.title: Docker下安装mysql
posts.text: ###拉取mysql镜像 1docker pull mysql 1234567docker run -p 3306:3306 \--privileged=true --restart=always --name mysql \-v /mydata/mysql/log:/var/log/mysql \-v /mydata/mysql/data:/var/lib/mysql \-v /mydata/mysql/conf:/etc/mysql \-e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=root \-d mysql:latest ###mysql配置 12345678910[mysql]default-character-set=utf8[mysqld]init_connect='SET collation_connection = utf8_unicode_ci'init_connect='SET NAMES utf8'character-set-server=utf8collation-server=utf8_unicode_ciskip-character-set-client-handshakeskip-name-resolve

posts.title: Docker下安装wordpress
posts.text: ###拉取wordpress镜像 1docker pull wordpress 12345678docker run -d \--name wordpress \--link mysql:mysql \-p 80:80 \-p 443:443 \-v /var/www/html:/var/www/html \-v /root/ssl:/ssl \wordpress ###Docker内不能直接使用vi vim命令，添加apt源 1234mv /etc/apt/sources.list /etc/apt/sources.list.bakecho "deb http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/debian stable main contrib non-free" > /etc/apt/sources.list \echo "deb http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/debian stable-updates main contrib non-free" >> /etc/apt/sources.list 12apt updateapt install vim

posts.title: 常用Linux命令
posts.text: ##不定期更新Linux常用命令 123netstat -nultp //查看端口占用情况nohup sh startup.sh -m standalone & //启动nacoschmod -R 777 /** //Linux修改文件操作权限命令 123456789docker run --name seata-server -d \ -p 8091:8091 \ -e SEATA_IP=120.76.137.203 \ -e SEATA_PORT=8091 \ -e SEATA_CONFIG_NAME=file:/root/seata-config/registry \ -v /mydata/seata/config:/root/seata-config \ -v /mydata/seata/logs:/root/logs \ --privileged=true \ seataio/seata-server:1.4.2

posts.title: nginx开启https配置
posts.text: nginx已经安装配置后1vim /usr/local/nginx/conf/nginx.conf #编辑nginx.conf配置文件 https加入如下配置12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728server { listen 443 ssl default; server_name _; ssl_certificate /etc/nginx/cert/***.pem; ssl_certificate_key /etc/nginx/cert/***.key; return 444;}server { listen 443 ssl; #监听443端口 server_name www.***.com; #访问的域名 ssl_certificate /usr/local/nginx/conf/cert/*.pem; #ssl证书路径 [注]docker下nginx需填写容器内部路径 ssl_certificate_key /usr/local/nginx/conf/cert/*.key; ssl_session_timeout 5m; ssl_ciphers HIGH:!aNULL:!MD5; ssl_prefer_server_ciphers on; location / { proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for; proxy_set_header Host $http_host; proxy_set_header X-Nginx-Proxy true; proxy_set_header Connection ""; proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:3000; #代理通过的端口 proxy_redirect default; }} 12345server { listen 80; #监听80端口 server_name www.***.com; #访问的域名 rewrite ^(.*)$ https://${server_name}$1 permanent; #重定向到https} http配置12345678910111213141516171819server { listen 80 default_server; server_name _; return 444;}server { listen 80; server_name www.***.com ***.com; location / { proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for; proxy_set_header Host $http_host; proxy_set_header X-Nginx-Proxy true; proxy_set_header Connection ""; proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:4000; proxy_redirect default; }}

posts.title: 图库
posts.text: 壁纸 二次元壁纸 海贼王 One Piece 从零开始的异界生活 如果真爱有颜色

posts.title: 随意笔记
posts.text: 算法练习排序算法冒泡排序1234567891011121314151617181920void BubbleSort(int arr[],int length){ for (int i = 0; i < length - 1; ++i) { int isSort = 1; //假设已经排好序 for (int j = 0; i < count - 1 - i; ++i) { if (arr[j] > arr[j+1]) { int temp = arr[j]; //如果arr[j]>arr[j+1]，两者交换位置 arr[j] = arr[j+1]; arr[j+1] = temp; isSort = 0; // 如果有一轮交换了位置,isSort置0 } } if (isSort == 1) //如果这一轮都没有元素交换位置,说明后面的元素已经排好序 { break; } }} 选择排序1234567891011121314151617void SelectSort(int arr[],int length){ for (int i = 0; i < length; ++i) { int min = i; //假设第i个元素为最小值 for (int j = i + 1; i < length; ++i) { if (arr[j] < arr[min]) { min = j; //更小元素的下标 } } int temp = arr[i]; arr[i] = arr[min]; arr[min] = temp; }} 插入排序1234567891011121314151617void InsertSort(int arr[] ,int length){ for (int i = 1; i < length; ++i) //i为将要插入的元素， { int value = arr[i]; int j = 0; for (j = i - 1; j >= 0; --j) { if (arr[j] > value) { arr[j+1] = arr[j]; }else{ break; //第j个元素小于或等于value，跳出循环 } } arr[j+1] = value; }} 希尔排序12

posts.title: 测试
posts.text: 测试删除多余网络连接HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\NetworkList\Profiles 解决打开人人开源fast-vue报错node-sass使用6.0.1 笔记git fetch 从远程获取最新版本到本地，不会自动mergegit pull 从远程获取最新版本到本地，并自动merge

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Quick StartTabs[Tab caption] [Any content (support inline tags too). Unique name : Unique name of tabs block tag without comma. Will be used in #id’s as prefix for each tab with their index numbers. If there are whitespaces in name, for generate #id all whitespaces will replaced by dashes. Only for current url of post/page must be unique![index] : Index number of active tab. If not specified, first tab (1) will be selected. If index is -1, no tab will be selected. It’s will be something like spoiler. Optional parameter.[Tab caption] : Caption of current tab. If not caption specified, unique name with tab index suffix will be used as caption of tab. If not caption specified, but specified icon, caption will empty. Optional parameter.[@icon] : FontAwesome icon name (full-name, look like ‘fas fa-font’) Can be specified with or without space; e.g. ‘Tab caption @icon’ similar to ‘Tab caption@icon’. Optional parameter. demo1test1 1test1 2test1 3This is Tab 1.This is Tab 2.This is Tab 3. More info: Server demo2test2 1test2 2test2 3This is Tab 1.This is Tab 2.This is Tab 3. More info: Generating demo3test3 1test3 2test3 3This is Tab 1.This is Tab 2.This is Tab 3. demo4第一个Tab炸弹tab名字为第一个Tab只有图标 没有Tab名字名字+icon demo5[text] [url] : 链接[text] : 按钮文字[icon] : [可选] 图标[color] : [可选] 按钮背景顔色(默认style时） 按钮字体和边框顔色(outline时) default/blue/pink/red/purple/orange/green[style] : [可选] 按钮样式 默认实心 outline/留空[layout] : [可选] 按钮佈局 默认为line block/留空[position] : [可选] 按钮位置 前提是设置了layout为block 默认为左边 center/right/留空[size] : [可选] 按钮大小 larger/留空 demo6 [src] : 图片链接[height] ： 图片高度限制【可选】 demo7臣亮言：先帝 创业未半，而中道崩殂 。今天下三分，益州疲敝 ，此诚危急存亡之秋 也！然侍衞之臣，不懈于内；忠志之士 ，忘身于外者，盖追先帝之殊遇，欲报之于陛下也。诚宜开张圣听，以光先帝遗德，恢弘志士之气；不宜妄自菲薄，引喻失义，以塞忠谏之路也。宫中、府中，俱为一体；陟罚臧否，不宜异同。若有作奸 、犯科 ，及为忠善者，宜付有司，论其刑赏，以昭陛下平明之治；不宜偏私，使内外异法也。

posts.title: newpage
posts.text: Quick Startdemo1默认 提示块标籤 default 提示块标籤 primary 提示块标籤 success 提示块标籤 info 提示块标籤 warning 提示块标籤 danger 提示块标籤 你是刷 Visa 还是 UnionPay 2021年快到了…. 小心开车 安全至上 这是三片呢？还是四片？ 你是刷 Visa 还是 UnionPay 剪刀石头布 前端最讨厌的浏览器 demo2 壁纸 收藏的一些壁纸 漫威 关于漫威的图片 OH MY GIRL 关于OH MY GIRL的图片 demo3哪个英文字母最酷？ 查看答案 因为西装裤(C装酷) 门里站着一个人? Click 闪 pie title Key elements in Product X "Calcium" : 42.96 "Potassium" : 50.05 "Magnesium" : 10.01 "Iron" : 5
